articles.title: Despite rain, Bristol expands outreach with MLB Speedway Classic - NASCAR.com
articles.description: The MLB Speedway Classic at Bristol Motor Speedway created a unique crossover between two of America's great past times.
articles.content: When Larry Carrier opened what would become Bristol Motor Speedway in 1961, this image never crossed his mind: an MLB player standing at home plate near the racing surface waiting on a fastball from … [+5833 chars]

articles.title: Palestinian-American dies of smoke inhalation in West Bank after settlers set fires to cars, homes - CBS News
articles.description: Khamis Ayyad died from smoke inhalation in Silwad, a village in the central West Bank, after putting out fires set by settlers, U.S. and Palestinian officials said.
articles.content:
A Palestinian American died in the Israeli-occupied West Bank last week after a confrontation with settlers, U.S. officials confirmed.
Khamis Ayyad, who was in his 40s, died Thursday from smoke inha… [+3618 chars]
